articles.title: Moon, Mars, and meteors: Why July 28 is the best night for skywatching all summer - Live Science
articles.description: A conjunction between a crescent moon and Mars joins an ongoing display of 'shooting stars,' making July 28 one of the best nights for skywatching all summer.

articles.title: Entangled Atomic Clock Experiment Could Finally Provide Hints At A Theory Of Everything - IFLScience
articles.description: One of the biggest challenges in modern physics is uniting quantum mechanics and general relativity. A new experiment may finally provide some answers.
